thread.title: Cigarette leads to Worcester woman’s arrest - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Cigarette leads to Worcester woman’s arrest - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Cigarette leads to Worcester woman’s arrest - Massachusetts news
text:
Everyone knows smoking is bad for your health. For one Worcester woman, smoking had other consequences.
Transit Police officers approached a woman at South Station on Monday. According to police she was smoking under a “No smoking” sign. The officers identified her as Joanne Keenan of Worcester, who they said had outstanding warrants for assault and battery on a police officer, assault and battery on ambulance personnel, and disorderly conduct.
She was arrested and transported to Transit Police Headquarters.
